messages.title: A NEW VOICE FOR SPELTHORNE
messages.content: Kwasi Kwarteng will be a strong voice in the government for the people of Spelthorne.

messages.title: WHY KWASI KWARTENG?
messages.content: He offers change with the Conservatives, emphasizing his belief in local peoples's ability to make better decisions for themselves than bureaucrats.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Committed to the NHS, supporting investment in local hospitals and aiming to draw up plans to reduce waiting times.
Intends to work with local Conservatives to reduce council tax and freeze or cut council spending without cutting frontline services.
Advocates reducing business rates, putting pressure on banks to lend to needs to small and medium-sized enterprises.

issues.economy: Kwasi is committed to sorting out the economy, vows to work with local Conservatives to reduce council tax, and freeze or cut council spending without cutting frontline services.
issues.education: Kwasi is committed to supporting local schools and ensuring children get the best start in life through a good education.
issues.governance: He wants to see power returned from bureaucrats in Whitehall to local people who can make better decisions for themselves.
issues.health: Kwasi emphasizes the importance of the NHS and wants to see investment in local hospitals and drawing up plans to reduce waiting times.
issues.immigration: He believes in fair immigration that contributes to British society and respects the country's laws.

images.caption: Kwasi Kwarteng with local constituents and in discussions about healthcare and education.
